title: Modern 1 BR nr Porter Sq w/ Outdoor Pool, Incl Heat & Hot Water.
posting_body: ['CAMBRIDGE –PORTER SQUARE', 'Price:', '$2,910', 'Available:', '07/27/22.', '1 BEDROOM - 1 BATH', 'Modern 1 bedroom apartment near Porter Square.', 'Galley kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and maple cabinets.', 'Hardwood floors.', 'Wall air conditioner.', 'Amenities include: Outdoor pool, fitness center and community room.', 'Heat, hot water and cooking gas included.', 'Coin-op laundry.', 'Parking for $125/month in driveway.', 'Cat ok for $50/month, dog ok for $75/month (breed restrictions apply).Listing# 198314234', '**NOTE: Price and availability, subject to change, without notice.', '**', 'Century 21 Avon', '1675 Massachusetts Ave.', 'Cambridge, MA 02138', '617-661-8400', 'E-mail: Click "Reply" button above.']
